createSharingGroupPrompt: Create a group to share visibility of your combined personal capital with others.
sharingGroupCreatedSuccessDesc: Your sharing group '{name}' has been successfully created.
sharingGroupNameMinLengthError: Group name must be at least 3 characters.
confirmDeleteSharingGroupMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the sharing group '{name}'? all members will lose visibility of each other's capital. this action cannot be undone.
sharingWithTitle: Users sharing visibility in this group
cannotRemoveOwnerError: The owner cannot be removed from the sharing group.
sharingGroupDetailsMissingError: Sharing group details are missing. cannot proceed.
createSharingGroupToInvite: Create or join a sharing group to send invitations.
sharingGroupNotFoundErrorDesc: The sharing group associated with your profile was not found. it may have been deleted.
invitationProcessedLabel: This sharing invitation has been processed.
yourVisibleCapitalInThisGroupLabel: Your visible capital in this group
capitalLoadingError: Failed to load sharing visibility details. invitations may still be visible.
noSentInvitationsFound: You have not sent any invitations for this group yet.
ownerCanInvite: Only the group owner can send new invitations.
userAlreadyInCapitalError: This user is already part of a capital sharing group and cannot be invited.
